name: OCKCartesianChartViewSynchronizer
desc: A view synchronizer that creates and updates chart view.

items.name: init(plotType: OCKCartesianGraphView.PlotType, selectedDate: Date)
items.desc: Creates a new chart synchronizer with a specific plot type, and selected date.

items.name: let plotType: OCKCartesianGraphView.PlotType
items.desc: The visual way the chart will plot that data, such as a bar, line, or scatter.

items.name: let selectedDate: Date
items.desc: The date selected in the chart.

items.name: func makeView() -> OCKCartesianChartView
items.desc: Creates a chart view that the view controller synchronizes.

items.name: func updateView(OCKCartesianChartView, context: OCKSynchronizationContext<[OCKDataSeries]>)
items.desc: Updates a view using a specific context
